projects.title: Agenda in Javascript
projects.desc: An agenda with an input to add tasks, and buttons to delete those tasks, a very simple project started with the idea to learn the basics of Javascript.

projects.title: Website Skeleton in ReactJs
projects.desc: Skeleton of a website started with create-react, a project started to learn React.Js

projects.title: GINI Index Calculator in Python
projects.desc: A GINI Index Calculator created in Python, using the numpy package. The goal of this project was to apply my Data Mining class material and possibly create a usable package in long run.

projects.title: REAC Organization
projects.desc: Volunteering experience during which I developed a web application for the organization that I volunteered at as a Web tutor for the marginalized commmunity of my hometown. We were able to create a simple JS web application that shows the fa√ßade of REAC.

projects.title: Authentication System with Symfony4
projects.desc: A simple login page created to learn how to use PHP's framework: Symfony4.

projects.title: Styled Login Form
projects.desc: A simple login page created to try myself at styling using CSS only

experience.title: UX Designer at Caciopee
experience.desc: An internship in which I have worked as a User Experience Designer in a fast, growing startup. My job was to test the system in many aspects, such as Perspicuity, Usability, Attractiveness etc... and find solutions to areas that lack in efficiency. I have learned to work with design tools such as Adobe XD, to communicate on a constant basis with the engineers in the company to create and make good use of surveys.

experience.title: Intern at ALM Solutions
experience.desc: An internship during the end of 2014 to January 2015, in which I was able to pick up skills in web development, mainly in PHP/MySQL, on which I am heavily interested in.

experience.title: Head of Department in the MedSharan International Tournament
experience.desc: Complete organisation of an international sports tournament, my team and I had to take care of all the work related to the tournament, more precisely I was taking care of the communication systems and external/internal communication during the tournament, a work that includes creating a simple system on Android to send messages between the different departments, and communicating with the sponsors and the incoming teams and univerities.

education.title: Bachelor in Computer Science at Al Akhawayn University
education.desc: I am currently going through a Computer Science major at Al Akhawayn University in Ifrane (AUI), and minoring in Business and Administration. I concentrated my studies in Data Mining, Competitive Programming, Cryptography and worked during my personal time on my Web Development skills.
